title: Modernizing Legacy Apps with Red Hat OpenShift Application Runtimes
description: Modernizing a legacy application in one big effort requires a lot of valuable resources from your organization. A better approach is to move existing apps to a modern deployment platform, implement DevOps processes, and incrementally replace old code with new functionality developed using modern techniques. It may sound challenging, but it doesnâ€™t have to be! With this course you will learn how to bring new business value to existing applications by developing and deploying with modern architectures and frameworks
